item.description:
Join NHC'er Lori for a fun and social evening of trickery, deceit, lies and sleuthing. The Guests will enjoy live music and hors'deurves when suddenly a murder occurs and the participants determine the motive and solve the crime. Prizes and awards will be presented based on best actor, best costume, most outrageous accent, and best super sleuth. For more information, click here.

Please note: Pre-registration is required and there is a $20.00 admission fee per person. To register call Lori Larsen at (203)-933-2200. Please register by Tuesday, 9/30, so that Lori can mail you your character assignment and theme of the event.
item.name: Murder Mystery Gala!
